com.red.boxx

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.red.boxx.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Area, Box, Enemy, Exit, Player, Wall

    public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    An actor is any entity that exists on the map. It has a starting location and an image. The actor has to deal with collision.
